You're right about needing custom components for advanced validation, as the UI currently only handles basic validation like "Required". The `RegisterFormValidationRule` is still available for custom validation. As far as I know, there's no official plan on the roadmap to expose these rules in the UI yet.
For now, you'll need to implement [custom validation using the API](https://docs.kentico.com/developers-and-admins/customization/extend-the-administration-interface/ui-form-components/ui-form-component-validation-rules "custom validation using the API").
Since there’s no mention of this feature on the [roadmap](https://roadmap.kentico.com/ "roadmap"), I’d recommend submitting it as a suggestion!
